statements: SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, cost FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY resource_name ASC, location_id DESC, cost ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT resource_name, cost FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY resource_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT resource_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation GROUP BY resource_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT resource_type, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM Healthcare_Resource_Allocation GROUP BY resource_type HAVING avg_cost > 500
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Medication';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, quantity FROM healthcare_resources ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Equipment' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT allocation_id, resource_id, allocated_to, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Medical Equipment' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM healthcare_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Medication' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_resources WHERE quantity < 50 AND resource_type = 'Personnel' ORDER BY resource_name ASC, quantity DESC;

SELECT ra.allocated_to, hr.resource_name FROM resource_allocation ra JOIN healthcare_resources hr ON ra.resource_id = hr.resource_id WHERE ra.allocation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ra.allocation_date DESC;

SELECT hr.resource_type, COUNT(ra.allocation_id) AS total_allocations FROM healthcare_resources hr LEFT JOIN resource_allocation ra ON hr.resource_id = ra.resource_id GROUP BY hr.resource_type ORDER BY total_allocations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals;
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, head_of_department, location FROM Departments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY hospital_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, contact_number FROM Hospitals WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND capacity < 200;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT appointment_date, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity > 10 AND location_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM appointments GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3);
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE available_beds > 0;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctor INNER JOIN Hospital ON Doctor.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patient ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, prescription_date FROM Medication WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Hospital WHERE available_beds > 50;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctor WHERE hospital_id = 1 ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patient WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT appointment_date, Appointment.appointment_id, doctor_name, patient_name FROM Appointment JOIN Doctor ON Appointment.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id JOIN Patient ON Appointment.patient_id = Patient.patient_id WHERE appointment_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;

SELECT medication_name, quantity, prescription_date, Patient.patient_name, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Medication JOIN Patient ON Medication.patient_id = Patient.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON Patient.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
